sentences.sentence: The value of Dutch and Japan increase between 2010 and 2014; while America keep stable between 2010 and 2014.
America has the lowest average value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2014.

sentences.sentence: The value of Dutch and Japan increase between 2010 and 2014; while America keep stable between 2010 and 2014.
America has the lowest average value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2014.
